caption: At this moment, Jack rushed back. He wore the guard's uniform and repelled most of the team members. However, due to the mission, the battle suit consumed most of its energy, and now it had no electricity. Without clothes, Jack was just an ordinary person. Unfortunately, the boss discovered another battle suit at the secret headquarters. He took one of the children with him to find the energy ball and locked the others in the room. He planted a bomb underground and it would explode in only five minutes. Jack knew that there was another exit, but the boss locked the computer which used to open the door. If they wanted to get out, they must crack the password in five minutes.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a science fiction movie
